oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Looking Inwards
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This dissertation is about my reflections about my own learning teaching process this year. To do this, I have included the two assignments I consider the most relevant ones in this Master: the Learning Unit and the Innovation Proposal, as a starting point for my musings.
